pages.text: The $(major)Ender Dragon Health/$ Gene allows players to $(minor)completely negate damage$() while a $(l:geneticsresequenced:items/dragon_health_crystal)Dragon Health Crystal/$ is in their inventory.$(br2)Any damage they would take is instead dealt to the Crystal's durability.$(br2)This Gene $(bad)cannot be given to mobs/$.
By default, you can get this gene from the following mobs:$(br)$(li)Ender Dragon
